title: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story II - Ano Toki no Bokura
title_japanese: テニスの王子様 OVA ANOTHER STORYⅡ～アノトキノボクラ
title_synonyms: Tennis no Ouji-sama OVA Another Story II: Ano Toki no Bokura
The Prince of Tennis OVA Another Story II: Ano Toki no Bokura
synopsis: Episode 1: Shiraishi becomes the captain of Shitenhoji Tennis Club. In order to maintain the club, the members have to invite a new member. They try to attract Zaizen's attention by showing him jokes but Zaizen passes them off. Episode 2: Ryoma is told Seigaku's seven ghost stories by Momoshiro. They are quite common stories but the third grade members leave the club room in a hurry. Fuji says "It's time to confide this to you." and he begins to tell what he experienced two years ago.

Prequel.name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message

Side story.name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story II - Ano Toki no Bokura Specials

opening_themes: "Aozora STAGE (アオゾラSTAGE)" by Tachikiri-tai (by断ち切り隊)
